PageDescription: ONLYOFFICE nabízí bezpečnou online kancelářskou sadu vysoce kompatibilní s formáty MS Office. Připojte jej ke své webové platformě pro úpravu dokumentů a spolupráci nebo jej používejte jako součást ONLYOFFICE Workspace.
SeeItInAction: Podívejte se na formulář v akci!
OODocsTheMostCompleteOfficeSuite:
<0>ONLYOFFICE Docs,
the most complete office suite
LearnMoreAboutOODocsFeatures: Další informace o funkcích aplikace ONLYOFFICE Docs
ViewEditAndCollaborateOnDocsSheetsSlides: Prohlížejte, upravujte a spolupracujte na <0>dokumentech</0>, <1>listech</1>, a <2>snímcích</2>
BuildFillablePDFFormsAndFillThemInOnline: Vytvářejte vyplnitelné <0>formuláře</0> a vyplňujte je online
ReadAndEditPDFsExportImportToFromPDF: Čtení souborů <0>PDFs</0>, export/import do/z formátu PDF
ConvertDocsToMarkdownAndHTML: Převádějte dokumenty do formátu Markdown a HTML
LearnMoreAboutOOCollaborationFeatures: Learn more about ONLYOFFICE collaboration features
ShareYourDocs: Sdílejte své dokumenty pouze pro prohlížení, úpravy, prohlížení, komentování nebo vyplňování formulářů
MakeUseOfCharacterAndParagraphLevel: Využívejte režimy společné editace na úrovni znaků a odstavců
CompareAndReviewDocsAndTrackChanges: Porovnávejte dokumenty, prohlížejte je a sledujte změny
CommunicateViaBuiltInChatOrTelegram: Komunikujte prostřednictvím integrovaného chatu nebo Telegramu
MakeAudioAndVideoCalls: Realizujte audio a video hovory pomocí aplikací Jitsi nebo Rainbow
TrustedByMore: Důvěřuje nám 15 000 000 uživatelů po celém světě
HowKinderhausBerlinShares: How Kinderhaus Berlin shares and collaborates on sensitive files with ONLYOFFICE DocSpace
WhyTheGuaraLinux: Why the Guará Linux team chooses ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors as the default office suite for 22.000 employees of the Military Police of Minas Gerais
HowCzechTVReplacedGoogleDocsAndMSOffice: Jak Česká televize nahradila Dokumenty Google a MS Office službou ONLYOFFICE a ownCloud
HowSWITCHIntegratedOOIntoSWITCHdrive: Jak SWITCH integroval ONLYOFFICE do SWITCHdrive a vytvořil tak kompletní alternativu k Office 365
TheCityOfHopewellVirginia: The City of Hopewell, Virginia: enabling remote work for 500 government employees with ONLYOFFICE
HowCalarAltoObservatory: Jak Calar Alto Observatory implementuje ONLYOFFICE pro bezpečnou a na místě nezávislou spolupráci
GetAnswersToTheMostPopularQuestions: Get answers to the most popular questions about ONLYOFFICE
IsONLYOFFICEReallyFreeDescription:
Yes, it is. ONLYOFFICE is a free and open-source office suite distributed under the AGPL 3.0 license. The source code repositories are available on <0>GitHub.

Besides, we offer a range of free solutions that you can choose from based on your needs. These include absolutely <1>free desktop editors for Windows/Linux/macOS, <2>free mobile apps for iOS/Android, <3>the free Startup plan of ONLYOFFICE DocSpace Cloud.

Free community builds of ONLYOFFICE solutions for self-hosting can be found <4>here.
WhatIsONLYOFFICEUsedForDescription:
ONLYOFFICE provides <0>a full range of tools to create, edit and collaborate on text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, PDF forms and regular PDF files on web, desktop and mobile platforms.

You can use the online editors <1>within any business platform or opt for the room-based content collaboration platform <2>ONLYOFFICE DocSpace which already comes with the integrated editors. Besides, you are able to <3>embed the editors into your own web app.

<4>Desktop editors for working with office documents offline, as well as <5>mobile apps are also available.
IsONLYOFFICESafeToUse: Yes, it is. We <0>prioritize</0> security with robust measures. ONLYOFFICE is open-source and GDPR compliant – which means it fits all the legal criteria for data protection. ONLYOFFICE includes file encryption and multiple options for secure sharing and access control. Besides, our solutions can be deployed on private servers.
CanIUseONLYOFFICEOfflineDescription: Yes, you can. To do so, download the free <0>ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors</0> which is available for Windows, Linux, and macOS.
NoOOIsAdFree: No, ONLYOFFICE is ad-free. We don't incorporate any external ads into our solutions.

OODocSpaceReleased: ONLYOFFICE DocSpace 3.0 released: updated user types, Virtual Data rooms, OAuth2.0, improved room & file management, and more
OODocsReleased: ONLYOFFICE Docs 8.3 released: PDF stamps, enhanced format support, Merge Shapes, and more
